Methods in com.aliyun.odps.mapred that throw OdpsException
static RunningJob JobClient.runJob(JobConf job)
          阻塞（同步）方式提交MapReduce作业并等待作业结束，作业成功则返回作业运行时的对象 RunningJob.
static RunningJob JobClient.submitJob(JobConf job)
          非阻塞（异步）方式提交MapReduce作业后立即返回，作业提交成功即返回作业运行时对象 RunningJob.
